short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a custom LinkedIn feed from only your favorite people and get analytics about your LinkedIn engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase your productivity on LinkedIn!

LinkLion is the first Chrome Extension to help create a custom-filtered LinkedIn Newsfeed. With LinkLion you can see only your favorite people's recent LinkedIn posts whenever you choose.

Easily toggle on your custom feed to see your favorite content and then turn it off to see the regular LinkedIn feed.

Use LinkLion to so you never miss a post from the following groups of people:
- Close friends and colleagues
- Industry experts and influencers
- Sales prospect or current customers

We hope you’ll enjoy using LinkLion.

We’d love to hear what you think about LinkLion. Please send us an email with your feedback to support@linklion.io
